400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be understood by the server.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to sign in to access this resource.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: The request conflicts with the current state of the server.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests. Please try again later.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: An unexpected error occurred on our servers.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server took too long to respond.

offline.title: No Internet Connection
offline.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The request took too long. Please try again.

connectionFailed.title: Connection Failed
connectionFailed.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please try again.

dataLoad.title: Failed to Load Data
dataLoad.message: We couldn't load the requested data. Please try refreshing the page.

dataSave.title: Failed to Save
dataSave.message: Your changes couldn't be saved. Please try again.

fileUpload.title: Upload Failed
fileUpload.message: The file couldn't be uploaded. Please check the file and try again.

permissionDenied.title: Permission Denied
permissionDenied.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

maintenanceMode.title: Under Maintenance
maintenanceMode.message: We're performing scheduled maintenance. Please check back soon.

submission.title: Form Submission Error
submission.message: There was an error submitting the form. Please check your input and try again.

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.message: Please correct the errors in the form.

failed.title: Payment Failed
failed.message: Your payment could not be processed. Please try a different payment method.

declined.title: Payment Declined
declined.message: Your payment was declined. Please check your payment details.

insufficientFunds.title: Insufficient Funds
insufficientFunds.message: Your payment method has insufficient funds.

conflictDetected.title: Schedule Conflict
conflictDetected.message: This time slot conflicts with another event.

bookingFailed.title: Booking Failed
bookingFailed.message: Unable to book the selected time slot.

facilityUnavailable.title: Facility Unavailable
facilityUnavailable.message: The selected facility is not available at this time.

sessionNotFound.title: Training Session Not Found
sessionNotFound.message: The training session you're looking for doesn't exist.

alreadyStarted.title: Session Already Started
alreadyStarted.message: This training session has already begun.

capacityReached.title: Session Full
capacityReached.message: This training session has reached maximum capacity.

messageSendFailed.title: Message Not Sent
messageSendFailed.message: Your message could not be sent. Please try again.

notificationFailed.title: Notification Failed
notificationFailed.message: Unable to send notifications at this time.
